front.title: Internet X.509 Public Key Infrastructure -- HTTP Transfer for the Certificate Management Protocol (CMP)

abstract.t: This document describes how to layer the Certificate Management Protocol (CMP) over HTTP.

It includes the updates to RFC 6712 specified in Section 3 of RFC 9480; these updates introduce CMP URIs using a well-known prefix. It obsoletes RFC 6712; and, together with RFC 9810, it also obsoletes RFC 9480.
